sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS city( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, buildings VARCHAR(512) NOT NULL, army VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, resources VARCHAR (128) NOT NULL )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO city(username, buildings, army, resources) VALUES(#username#, #buildings#, #army#, #resources#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE city SET buildings = #buildings#, army = #army#, resources = #resources# WHERE username = #username#
